channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Man injured in drive-by shooting in downtown St. Louis

Democrats want health care tax credits to end the shutdown. Why the GOP says not yet.
Man dies days after being charged in 1973 killing of Connecticut woman
item.description: Police charged George Legere, 77, with murder after he confessed to fatally stabbing 21-year-old Janet Couture in her East Hartford apartment.

item.title: Tropical Storm Jerry churns over central Atlantic Ocean
item.description: Tropical Storm Jerry continued to churn over tropical waters of the central Atlantic Ocean and was likely to become a hurricane.

item.title: Dogs kill 2-year-old boy at Georgia daycare center
item.description: A 2-year-old boy in south Georgia has died after being attacked by two Rottweilers at an unlicensed daycare

item.title: Texas National Guard seen at training center in Chicago suburbs
item.description: Members of the Texas National Guard have been seen at an Army Reserve Training Center in the southwest suburbs of Chicago, ABC News has learned.
